Class Stone

java.lang.Object
objects.Stone
public class Stone extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Stone(int x, int y)
    Constructor for Stone object Precondition: x and y are valid coordinates within the game window Postcondition: A Stone object is created at the specified coordinates

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    draw(Graphics2D g2d)
    Draws the stone on the provided Graphics2D context Precondition: g2d is a valid Graphics2D object Postcondition: The stone image is drawn at its coordinates
    Rectangle
    getBounds()
    Gets the bounding rectangle of the stone for collision detection Precondition: N/A Postcondition: A Rectangle object representing the stone's bounds is returned
    void
    playAnimation()
    Plays the stone's shake animation Precondition: N/A Postcondition: The stone's shake offset is set to initiate the animation
    void
    update()
    Updates the stone's animation state Precondition: N/A Postcondition: The stone's shake offset is updated

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Stone

      public Stone(int x, int y)
      Constructor for Stone object Precondition: x and y are valid coordinates within the game window Postcondition: A Stone object is created at the specified coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the stone
      y - the y-coordinate of the stone

  • Method Details

    • playAnimation

      public void playAnimation()
      Plays the stone's shake animation Precondition: N/A Postcondition: The stone's shake offset is set to initiate the animation

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the stone's animation state Precondition: N/A Postcondition: The stone's shake offset is updated

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2d)
      Draws the stone on the provided Graphics2D context Precondition: g2d is a valid Graphics2D object Postcondition: The stone image is drawn at its coordinates
      Parameters:
      g2d - the Graphics2D object to draw on

    • getBounds

      public Rectangle getBounds()
      Gets the bounding rectangle of the stone for collision detection Precondition: N/A Postcondition: A Rectangle object representing the stone's bounds is returned
      Returns:
      a Rectangle representing the stone's bounding box
